channel.title: Web client question - my turn
channel.description: Using a basically blank non-refactored deob, figured out some problems to why it wasn't loading, now I keep getting "Requesting title screen", then it says "Connection error", now before you client experts say "Change the sprites directory" - I already have, it all loads perfectly fine as .jar, and just by batch / Client, when I load it onto a web page, it fails to load, anyone know why? I replaced my class44 with one from my old client, and still the same error.

item.title: Web client question - my turn
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

Using a basically blank non-refactored deob, figured out some problems to why it wasn’t loading, now I keep getting “Requesting title screen”, then it says “Connection error”, now before you client experts say “Change the sprites directory” - I already have, it all loads perfectly fine as .jar, and just by batch / Client, when I load it onto a web page, it fails to load, anyone know why? I replaced my class44 with one from my old client, and still the same error.

Read full topic
